divs: Sighting Detailswhen i first noticed the lights i thought maybe it was helicopters because they appeard to be close to each other. the lights were steady not flashing or blinking. approx 6 or 7 redish orange lights appeared sationary at first then three moved to form a triangle then spread apart. we were driving so had to take a side street to see again. three lights disappeared leavin approx 3 or 4 for about 30 seconds then all lights disappeared. the lights never blinked or flashed and made no streaks we could see when they moved. a few were more intense in color than the others. we are in a rural area and there are no cell towers or any types of lights in this area.
Summary: approx 6 redish orange lights appeared stationary at first
trends: There has been one other sighting in Crestwood
There were no other sightings in Crestwood on or around December 24th 2010
